name: worksheet_processor
description: Multimodal specialist agent for processing textbook images and generating differentiated worksheets for multiple grade levels

skills.name: Textbook Image Processing
skills.description: Process photos of textbook pages and extract educational content for worksheet creation
examples: Upload a photo of a math textbook page to generate worksheets for grades 3-5
Process an image of a science diagram to create differentiated activities
Extract text from a Hindi textbook page and create multilevel exercises

skills.name: Multi-Grade Worksheet Generation
skills.description: Create worksheets adapted for multiple grade levels from single source content
examples: Generate worksheets for grades 1, 3, and 5 from the same mathematics concept
Create beginner, intermediate, and advanced versions of science activities
Adapt reading comprehension for different literacy levels

skills.name: Educational Content Extraction
skills.description: Extract and analyze text from educational images using advanced OCR
examples: Extract Hindi and English text from mixed-language textbooks

skills.name: Educational Content Analysis
skills.description: Analyze educational content complexity and determine appropriate grade levels
examples: Determine if content is appropriate for grade 4 or grade 6
Analyze vocabulary complexity in multilingual content
